thread.title: Cassandra Donaldson

author: Cassandra Donaldson
title: Cassandra Donaldson
text:
First I went to Amazon to look for the book. I ordered from 3 different sellers and, even after them sending the 'correct' book as a replacement, I still didn't get the right one. Getting the correct book was such a refreshing turn of events that I ordered the other books in the set I was missing. I actually got those ones right the first time too.
Definitely coming here for any other book purchases, especially older or out of print ones.
